commit message: Help and about screens were added.
About and help can be called from the game screen options menu.
Images for the pieces were added.
End game by wining line check was implemented.
Model objects are almost full implemented.
Initial game screen is initialized properly.
Sounds and user clicks handling were added.
Valid move algorithms have two bugs.
The computer player was half implemented.
Computer moves done by separate thread.
First playable version of the game.
First version published in Google Play.
Game was published in Google Play also.
About and help screens were described.
Top down and bottom up approaches were described.
Last two chapters were lost because of KUbuntu and LibreOffice encoding.
Half of the functions programming chapter was written.
More of the functional implementation chapter was done.
Empty win line bug was fixed.
There is a bug in the move validation.
Some bugs were found and killed without mercy.
Bug free version was published in Android Play Store.
Some part of the server side was implemented.
Client side communication template was implemented.
Two players on a single device mode was added.
Game tree building was implemented but it was not tested.
